sentence: A vote for RINO Brian Kemp in this primary is a vote for Governor Stacey Abrams.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Donald Trump to Headline Rally in Georgia with 7 Endorsed Primary Candidates

sentence: Donald Trump tried to rouse Georgia Republican voters to back struggling primary challenger David Perdue against incumbent Republican Governor Brian Kemp in a rally on Saturday night, less than two months before an election that will test the former president's status as GOP kingmaker.
author: Mark Niquette
title: Trump Holds Georgia Rally in Effort to Retain GOP Kingmaker Role
